androidx.leanback.widget

Class DetailsParallaxDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Drawable
      • androidx.leanback.graphics.CompositeDrawable
        • androidx.leanback.widget.DetailsParallaxDrawable

  • public class DetailsParallaxDrawable
extends CompositeDrawable
    Helper class responsible for wiring in parallax effect in DetailsFragment. The default effect will render a drawable like the following two parts, cover drawable above DetailsOverviewRow and solid color below DetailsOverviewRow. 
            ***************************
        *        Cover Drawable   *
        ***************************
        *    DetailsOverviewRow   *
        *                         *
        ***************************
        *     Bottom Drawable     *
        *      (Solid Color)      *
        *         Related         *
        *         Content         *
        ***************************
    • Call DetailsParallaxDrawable(Context, DetailsParallax) to create DetailsParallaxDrawable using FitWidthBitmapDrawable for cover drawable.
  • In case the solid color is not set, it will use defaultBrandColorDark from LeanbackTheme.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class androidx.leanback.graphics.CompositeDrawable

        CompositeDrawable.ChildDrawable

    • Constructor Detail

      • DetailsParallaxDrawable

        public DetailsParallaxDrawable(Context context,
                               DetailsParallax parallax,
                               Drawable coverDrawable,
                               ParallaxTarget coverDrawableParallaxTarget)
        Creates a DetailsParallaxDrawable using a cover drawable.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to get resource values.
        parallax - DetailsParallax to add background parallax effect.
        coverDrawable - Cover drawable at top
        coverDrawableParallaxTarget - Define a ParallaxTarget that would be performed on cover Drawable. e.g. To change "verticalOffset" of cover Drawable from 0 to 120 pixels above screen, uses: new ParallaxTarget.PropertyValuesHolderTarget( coverDrawable, PropertyValuesHolder.ofInt("verticalOffset", 0, -120))

      • DetailsParallaxDrawable

        public DetailsParallaxDrawable(Context context,
                               DetailsParallax parallax,
                               Drawable coverDrawable,
                               Drawable bottomDrawable,
                               ParallaxTarget coverDrawableParallaxTarget)
        Creates a DetailsParallaxDrawable using a cover drawable and bottom drawable.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to get resource values.
        parallax - DetailsParallax to add background parallax effect.
        coverDrawable - Cover drawable at top
        bottomDrawable - Bottom drawable, when null it will create a default ColorDrawable.
        coverDrawableParallaxTarget - Define a ParallaxTarget that would be performed on cover Drawable. e.g. To change "verticalOffset" of cover Drawable from 0 to 120 pixels above screen, uses: new ParallaxTarget.PropertyValuesHolderTarget( coverDrawable, PropertyValuesHolder.ofInt("verticalOffset", 0, -120))

      • DetailsParallaxDrawable

        public DetailsParallaxDrawable(Context context,
                               DetailsParallax parallax)
        Creates DetailsParallaxDrawable using FitWidthBitmapDrawable for cover drawable.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to get resource values.
        parallax - DetailsParallax to add background parallax effect.
